BIO

My name is Gloria Chinedu, born on 7th February 1981 in Jos Plateau State Nigeria. Married with two lovely daughters, Faith and Dorcas Chinedu. I hold a Bachelor Of Technology Degree in Quantity Surveying from Abubarkar Tafawa Balewa University, Bauchi. I am currently into Web Development because of my current passion to impact the programming and to bring about a change in current orientation where the "Tech World" is seen as an exclusive reserve for the male gender in Africa. I am also an entrepreneur with a passion for livestocks.
